facescard.name: Hieu
facescard.aboutthem: Hieu is a Manager in Vietnam. She is strong team player and always keen to reach outside her comfort zone and try something new.

facescard.name: Charlotte
facescard.aboutthem: Charlotte joined Authorised Audit ten years ago as a Manager and is now a Consulting Partner in France.

facescard.name: Pernille
facescard.aboutthem: Pernille is one of our communications specialists in the Netherlands and is also a keen salsa dancer.

facescard.name: Jose
facescard.aboutthem: Jose is a Corporate Finance adviser from Spain and is also part of Authorised Audit’s Future Leaders programme.

facescard.name: Anna
facescard.aboutthem: When Anna isn’t working as a Senior Tax Technology Consultant, she can be found on her bike or playing squash.

facescard.name: Ani
facescard.aboutthem: In addition to her client work as a Technology Consultant, Ani likes to get involved with local charities and build on Authorised Audit’s US internship programme.

facescard.name: David
facescard.aboutthem: David is a Tax Senior Manager in the US. He works with our US Firm and a local charity to support military veterans and also students from underrepresented communities.

facescard.name: Allison
facescard.aboutthem: Allison is Tax Manager in the US and a member of the Abilities Steering Committee at RSM. In her free time, she represents her country at Wheelchair Rugby.

facescard.name: Estefani
facescard.aboutthem: Estefani is one of our communications specialists in Peru. In her spare time, she enjoys salsa, bachata, running, cooking and photography.

facescard.name: Ulrikke
facescard.aboutthem: Ulrikke is a Senior Associate in Norway and enjoys living an athletic lifestyle.

facescard.name: Felipe
facescard.aboutthem: Felipe is a Junior lawyer in Colombia. He is passionate about urbanism and the ways in which we can create more liveable, sustainable cities to make a real difference in people's lives.

facescard.name: Henry
facescard.aboutthem: Henry champions diversity and inclusion, believing that sharing perspectives leads to a better collaborative environment both internally and externally.

worldwidelocation1.detailpara1: The COVID-19 crisis has been a catalyst for dramatic change across Africa: the continent has struggled with an ill prepared health-care system, suffered from little fiscal headroom for supportive investments and experienced significant disruption across all sectors, most notably in the financial industry, tourism and hospitality.
worldwidelocation1.detailpara2: Despite this backdrop, there are many opportunities in the change. The crisis is accelerating trends such as digitisation, market consolidation, and collaboration across countries both in the Region and outside. Across Africa they have a predominantly youthful population (median age 19) keen to embrace change and new ways to do everything.
worldwidelocation1.detailpara3: Authorised Audit representation across the region is extensive. We offer a full range of services that can help you take advantage of the myriad of investment opportunities in this vast resource-rich land of opportunity.

detailcard.cardname: Authorised Audit global revenue leaps 16% to record US$9.4bn

worldwidelocation1.detailpara1: The Asia Pacific region covers a vast area and a multitude of individual economies, each at varying stages of development offering different levels of growth. Investing and doing business in the region requires knowledge of a number of facets that affect each country.
worldwidelocation1.detailpara2: Authorised Audit’s long-standing presence in Asia Pacific provides clients with the knowledge to unlock the market’s potential, while helping them to navigate the diverse labour laws, compliance legislations and crossborder challenges. Our deep expertise in investment strategies, corporate set-ups, market intelligence and transfer pricing is essential for those businesses looking to enter the region.

worldwidelocation1.detailpara1: As one of the most diverse regions in the world, Europe offers significant opportunities for business growth and expansion. However, the diversity of the region with varying currencies, regulations and stages of economic growth, can make Europe a very complex place for businesses to thrive.
worldwidelocation1.detailpara2: With over 10,000+ staff across the region, RSM assists businesses to anticipate and understand these complexities, in order to succeed in the largest consumer market in the world.

detailcard.cardname: Manufacturing in Europe: Data, cybersecurity and digital transformation
How manufacturers are adopting Industry 4.0 in Europe

worldwidelocation1.detailpara1: The COVID-19 pandemic revolutionised everything, generating new ways of doing business in the process. In 2020, Latin American economies were confronted with balancing fiscal deficits with the need to help companies and citizens alike to deal with the many unprecedented challenges created by the virus. But things are changing. According to estimates from the International Monetary Fund, Latin America will see a recovery of more than 4% in 2021 alone. In many cases, COVID-19 has acted as an accelerator for Latin American companies to move more quickly on previously planned projects such as the digitalisation of their processes, the shift towards e-commerce and the reconfiguration of supply chains.

detailcard.cardname: Generative AI: transforming Audit, Tax and Accounting in all industries

Governance takes centre stage

officecard.heading: Mumbai-Andheri

officecard.carddetailpara1: Behind every development, there are innovative minds at work backed by in-depth knowledge and astute thinking. Today, when business enterprises are exploring opportunities beyond the horizons and cruising at high altitudes of success, you need a trusted knowledge partner to navigate the turbulent times.

officecard.heading: Surat
officecard.detailhead: Assurance, Risk Advisory, Tax and Consulting Services in Surat
officecard.carddetailpara1: The city of Surat in Gujarat is renowned for its diamond cutting and polishing sector. The Gems & Jewellery Industry is one of the fastest growing segments in India, and The Surat Diamond Bourse is the world’s largest diamond trading hub, as well as the world’s largest office building, ahead of The Pentagon.
officecard.carddetailpara2: Authorised Audit India is considered as a Preferred Service Provider by the players from the Gems & Jewellery industry. We service a large number of industry players involved in the industry (domestic focused as well as internationally focused) including a dominant portion of the Gems & Jewellery exporters. We cater to their professional services requirements both, in India and at their overseas locations. Further, given our national and international reach, we are able to provide the said services to our clients at all their business locations. With our integrated and customized IT software solutions for the Gems and Jewellery industry, we are one of the leading service providers of end-to-end IT solutions, implementation services and management consultancy. Our multi-disciplinary teams of professionals with expert professional knowledge in the fields of audit, tax, legal, Information Technology, HR, Operations Consulting, etc. and senior professionals possess extensive experience in catering to this industry.Contact RSM in Surat for extensive experience in advisory, taxation and accounting matters of the Gems & Jewellery sector across various functions and geographies. With a deep understanding of the various finer aspects of the Gems & Jewellery industry on a variety of fronts, we are in a unique position to offer a range of pragmatic and customized solutions to clients.
officecard.serviceoffered: Teams of qualified Accountants, Engineers, MBA’s and other professionals combine expert knowledge with technology systems and digital infrastructure to provide vital services like Internal Auditing, Tax Advisory and Compliances, Financial Reporting, Accounts Outsourcing, Goods and Services Tax and others.
officecard.clientindustries: The businesses we serve are IT & ITeS, Gems and Jewellery, Textiles, Fintech and manufacturing industries.
